addPopupMenu() - method in class BBjWidget

addStyle(String p_styleName!) - method in class BBjWidget

B

BBjWidget - class in this project

Standard Implementation of a BBjWidget Tries to implement all necessary methods of the BBj Interface BBjControl with useful functionality so that only methods that need to work different in a given control have to be implemented in the actual widget


BBjWidget() - constructor in class BBjWidget
